alert.note: Alert for Dane; Green; Iowa; Lafayette (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 10:31AM CDT until July 26 at 11:15AM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Lafayette County in south central Wisconsin... Green County in south central Wisconsin... Southeastern Iowa County in south central Wisconsin... Southwestern Dane County in south central Wisconsin... * Until 1115 AM CDT. * At 1031 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Mount Horeb to near Argyle to near Apple River, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fitchburg, Monroe, Oregon, Belleville, New Glarus, Brooklyn, Monticello, Albany, Argyle, Blanchardville, Wiota, Dayton, South Wayne, Browntown, Gratiot, Attica, Jordan Center, Paoli, Mount Vernon, and Woodford. This includes the following Location York Memorial Church. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
